title: Determined AI
author: HPE
description: World-class capabilities to support training at enterprise-scale.
overview:
Built for our hybrid cloud world to help you unlock the full potential of your data.

Block Storage enables: - Simplified deployment of new server hardware from bare metal to configuration. - Unified management and monitoring of new and existing compute devices across locations. - Label and Group devices for intuitive inventory management. - Firmware management and compliance. - Policy-driven governance and automation. - Secure connectivity from edge-to-cloud and Single Sign-on.
